00aa827aedb51be01f2ceb1073b95f63d97680e1.query:
SELECT count(*) AS count 
            FROM recent_thanked
            WHERE user_id = $1 
            AND did_thank = $2
            AND at_time > $3
            AND server_id = $4

390573789acf850dbd00dbaa2ee2a41aa3b8451f.query:
DELETE FROM message_content
        CASCADE
        WHERE at_time < $1

487dcc03d5aa88d56792ff02d14524d0111d62d1.query:
SELECT time_between_thanking
        FROM server_config
        WHERE server_id=$1

73de726bbb307fc07c80f8927befefb283079a78.query:
INSERT INTO server_config (server_id, time_between_thanking)
        VALUES ($1,$2)
        ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT server_config_pk
        DO
        UPDATE SET time_between_thanking=$2

7615b1d38f8231692abc957ed8367917ef662318.query:
INSERT INTO recent_thanked (user_id, did_thank, server_id, at_time)
                    VALUES ($1,$2,$3,$4)
                    ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT recent_thanked_pk 
                    DO
                    UPDATE SET at_time = $4;

7cf5fadd0dd7d5b23682f79bfee5b8795edc2895.query: INSERT INTO message_content (author_id,message_id, server_id, at_time, content) VALUES($1,$2,$3,$4,$5)

93570c4015abd60865a2246b9c6695b577cfda40.query:
INSERT INTO thanked_users (user_id,server_id, times)
                VALUES($1,$2,1) 
                ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT thanked_users_pk 
                DO 
                UPDATE SET times = thanked_users.times + 1;

c1758c21dea0a590ec1aed074ca8db740ac10cac.query:
SELECT user_id, times
        FROM thanked_users
        WHERE user_id != $1
        AND server_id = $2
        ORDER BY times DESC
        LIMIT 10

f9157a66ea07ed508eb51b218705c4bf762ce5ad.query:
SELECT 
            author_id,content 
        FROM message_content
        WHERE message_id = $1
        AND server_id = $2
        AND (
            0 < (
                SELECT count(*) AS role_count
                FROM pinged_roles 
                WHERE message_id = $1
                AND server_id = $2
            )
            OR 0 < (
                SELECT count(*) AS user_count
                FROM pinged_users 
                WHERE message_id = $1
                AND server_id = $2
            )
        )
